offers.name: DIRECTV SELECT<sup>tm</sup>
offers.legal: For 12 Months W/ 24-mo. TV agmt* $90/mo. in months 13-24 (subject to change). Regional sports fee up to $7.29/mo. is extra & applies in certain markets. For SELECT All-Included TV Pkg.
